document.full_text: david krejci scored an overtime goal to seal a 3-2 win over the philadelphia flyers on monday and carry the boston bruins to a 2-0 lead in their second round playoff series.
document.title: krejci scores ot winner to put bruins 2-0 up on flyers
lines_and_colors: david krejci scored an overtime goal to seal a 3-2 win over the philadelphia flyers on monday and carry the boston bruins to a 2-0 lead in their second round playoff series.
